reassurance about your baby’s

You will usually be able to go 
home once you are reassured.
An ultrasound scan to check 
on the growth of your baby, as 
well as the amount of amniotic 
fluid	around	your	baby,	may	be	
arranged if:
• your uterus measures 
smaller than expected;
• your pregnancy has risk 
factors associated with 
stillbirth;
• the heart-rate monitoring is
